snippet.title: I Am The Hero - TRAILER
snippet.description:
I Am The Hero  is a pixel FTG with Multi-Posture Beat'em Up Style.

We make this game with many kind of reasons, some different views from childhood, some early fuzzy memories, and of course our passion to the classical Fighting Games.


FEATURES:

1. Simple Skill Input: by pressing any arrow key right after any of 3 attack buttons, you can cast a special skill, which can be different on air and ground.  

2. Free Style Combos: By all kinds of special skills , you can create your own fighting style. Trample or Floating-air or Rush-around or Charging or something else we don't know. Just feel free to beat'em up.

3. Critical Judgement: By Pressing Punch Button at the blink time of enemy's attack, you will cast a Critical Attack which takes huge damage to enemies around.


MORE TO COME:
1. Unlock All NPCs To Join Online Chaos Battle.
